name: Power Flow!
description:
Power Flow is an innovative and challenging game that tasks players with creating and managing a network of vehicle charging stations.
Generate energy by establishing power plants around a river and use it to power the charging stations.
Earn money as vehicles charge and use it to purchase new and more powerful reels. As you progress, merge reels to create even more powerful charging stations and expand your network to meet the growing demand for electric vehicle charging.
With challenging gameplay and endless possibilities for expansion, Power Flow will test your strategic and management skills.
